results.name: For any number n with binary expansion (b(1), b(2), ..., b(k)), the binary expansion of a(n) is (floor((b(k)+b(1)+b(2))/2), floor((b(1)+b(2)+b(3))/2), ..., floor((b(k-1)+b(k)+b(1))/2).
comment: This sequence is a variant of A342697; here we deal with bit triples in a "cyclic" binary representation of n.
